Chitrasiri.The bench communicated its opinion to the Presidential Secretariat yesterday.The Supreme Court has communicated to the Presidential Secretariat that President Maithripala Sirisenas term was only five years, according to the media release issued by the Presidents Media Division today. Last week the President had made a reference to the Supreme Court seeking its opinion whether he could serve up to six years. The five-member bench of the Supreme Court has unanimously ruled that the Presidents term was restricted only to five years. The bench comprised Chief Justice Priyasath Dep, Eva Wanasundare, Buvaneka Aluvihare, Sisira de Abrew and K. Chitrasiri. The bench communicated its opinion to the Presidential Secretariat yesterday.
title: SC decided Presidents term is for five years
